commands.name: az iot central device c2d-message purge
commands.summary: Purges the cloud-to-device message queue for the target device.
commands.syntax:
az iot central device c2d-message purge --app-id
                                        --device-id
                                        [--central-api-uri]
                                        [--token]
examples: az iot central device c2d-message purge --app-id {appid} --device-id {deviceid}
